name: spo-sharepoint-alerts-audit
title: SharePoint Online - Export SharePoint Alerts
shortDescription: This PowerShell script scans your SharePoint Online environment and exports a list of all classic SharePoint Alerts configured by users across all site collections.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample SharePoint Online - Export SharePoint Alerts

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
